attributes.action: We Require  Nigel Farage and Paul Nuttall to be part of the Brexit Govt Team.
attributes.additional_details: Martin Bennett,  Debbie Sherwood, Linda Lindsay, Eric George Ginn, William Stephenson, John Simpson.
attributes.background: Nigel Farage & Paul Nuttall of UKIP have been fundamental in getting this referendum.  It is only fair and courteous that they should be part of the Brexit Govt team.
